text: Over six seasons, we ’ ve seen the Stark family separated from one another, and sometimes from their own heads. We ’ ve seen them endure unspeakable hardships, such as weddings. Now, Entertainment Weekly has reunited the remaining Starks in a photo shoot ― the Final Four, if you will ― so you know a party is coming. The photos of Sansa ( Sophie Turner ), Bran ( Isaac Hempstead Wright ), Jon Snow ( Kit Harington ) and Arya ( Maisie Williams ) may reveal another, more subtle reunion going on, too. One tiny detail seems to further support information about the upcoming Season 7 from a rumored leaker : See anything funny? Can ’ t quite put your “ little ” finger on it? Look again at Arya.
